Question: Which of the following statements is true regarding the character Cassie and the Jonah Hex franchise?
Options:
A. a) Cassie interacts with Jonah Hex in the movie.
B. b) Jonah Hex appears in the animated short 'DC Showcase: Jonah Hex'.
C. c) Thomas Jane voiced Jonah Hex in the 2010 animated short.
D. d) Cassie is a character in the animated short 'DC Showcase: Jonah Hex'.
Answer: a) Cassie interacts with Jonah Hex in the movie. and c) Thomas Jane voiced Jonah Hex in the 2010 animated short.

Question: Which actors were involved in the casting of *Jonah Hex*?
Options:
A. Thomas Jane
B. Josh Brolin
C. Aidan Quinn
D. All of the above

Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding Thomas Jane and the character Jonah Hex?
Options:
A. a) Thomas Jane underwent a makeup transformation to secure the role of Jonah Hex.
B. b) Thomas Jane voiced Jonah Hex in the 2010 animated short DC Showcase: Jonah Hex.
C. c) Josh Brolin was ultimately cast as Jonah Hex.
D. d) Jonah Hex is a character from Marvel Comics.
Answer: a) Thomas Jane underwent a makeup transformation to secure the role of Jonah Hex. & b) Thomas Jane voiced Jonah Hex in the 2010 animated short DC Showcase: Jonah Hex. & c) Josh Brolin was ultimately cast as Jonah Hex.
